name: com.mccreery.textbox
description:
Common functionality for achieving a 'typing' effect in a textbox.
Features include:
▪ Keypress sound with pitch shift options
▪ Extra pauses between words
▪ Automatic binding to Text and AudioSource components

You can use the script on any GameObject with a Text component inside a canvas. Rich text is required because the Textbox component avoids wrapping issues by setting the text color to transparent in the remaining text. Existing rich text tags are retained.
